Text.Language: Cemou] e~ro dikeoc: w~ y/eyouab Maria: je ]mahc~nou] n~c~k/n/: n~te n/e#y#u#.
You are called truly, O St. Mary, the Second Tabernacle, belonging to the holies.

Y/etou,/ n~q/tc: n~je pis~bwt n~te Aa~rwn: nem ]h~r/ri e#y#u#: n~te pic~yoinoufi.
Wherein is placed, the rod of Aaron, and the holy flower, of incense.

Tejolh m~pitoubo: caqoun nem cabol: w~]c~k/n/ n~kayaroc: v~manswpi n~nidikeoc.
You are clothed with purity, within and without, O pure tabernacle, the dwelling of the righteous.

Nitagma n~te p~[ici: nem p~,oroc n~te niy~m/i: ceereudoxazin: n~nemakaricmoc.
The hosts of the high standings, and the chorus of the just, glorify You, and Your blessedness.

Eybe vai ten[ici: m~mo axiwc: qen hanu~mnologia~: m~p~rov/tikon.
Wherefore we, magnify you befittingly, with prophetic, hymnology.

Je aucaji eyb/]: n~hanh~b/oui~ eutai/out: ]baki e#y#u#: n~te pinis] n~ouro.
For they spoke of you, with great honor, O holy city, of the great King.

We entreat and pray, that we may win mercy, through your intercessions, with the Lover of Mankind.
